#summary A showcase for code_swarm videos.

To encourage the production of excellent code_swarm videos, we will list existing ones here. If you create or come across one not in the list, please share it with us.

== Collections ==
 * Vimeo channel: http://www.vimeo.com/codeswarmers
 * Vimeo search for [http://www.vimeo.com/videos/search:codeswarm "codeswarm"]
 * Flickr search for [http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=codeswarm&w=all "codeswarm"]
 * !YouTube search for [http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=code_swarm&search_type=&aq=f "code_swarm"] and [http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=codeswarm&search_type=&aq=f "codeswarm"]
